Minor Requirements: Minimum grade of 'C' in courses applied to the minor

Complete the following:: HIST 201 - Introduction to the Study of History (3)

Complete one of the following:: HIST 411 - Service Learning in Public History (3)
HIST 414 - Historic Preservation in the US (3)
HIST 418 - The American House: Everyday Architecture in America (3)
HIST 426 - Objects in History/Objects as History: Material Culture and Museum Studies for Historians (3)
HIST 427 - Digital Public History: Using Digital Tools to Interpret Difficult Pasts (3)

Complete 6 credits, including a minimum: AMST 422 - Preserving Places, Making Spaces in Baltimore (3)
AMST 480 - Community in America Research Seminar (3)
